com.wizturn.sdk.central

Class CentralManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wizturn.sdk.central.CentralManager

  • public final class CentralManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides all the functions which central device must have.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes the manager.
      void connect(Peripheral peripheral, OnConnectListener listener)
      Connects to the given peripheral and registers the OnConnectListener.
      void connectWithDelay(Peripheral peripheral, OnConnectListener listener)
      Connects to the given peripheral and registers the OnConnectListener after 500ms delay.
      void disconnect()
      Disconnects to the currently connected peripheral if exists.
      void disconnectWithDelay()
      Disconnects to the currently connected peripheral if exists after 500ms delay.

      Returns an instance of BluetoothGattWriter to change Bluetooth characteristics(e.g. uuid, txPower, major id, minor id, advertisement interval).

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        @Deprecated
public static CentralManager getInstance(Context context)
        Deprecated. 
        Gets an instance of CentralManager(singleton). Instead of using this method, getInstance() is more recommended.

      • getInstance

        public static CentralManager getInstance()
        Gets an instance of CentralManager(singleton).

      • init

        public void init(Context context)
        Initializes central manager.

      • setPeripheralScanListener

        public void setPeripheralScanListener(PeripheralScanListener listener)
        Sets PeripheralScanListener for handling a scanned(or found) peripheral after calling startScanning().
        Parameters:
        callback - a concrete instance of PeripheralScanListener method

      • startScanning

        public boolean startScanning()
        Starts scanning.
        You must stop scanning if users want to finish your application by calling stopScanning().

      • stopScanning

        public void stopScanning()
        Stops scanning

      • isScanning

        public boolean isScanning()
        Indicates whether scanning is now performing or not.
        Returns:
        true if scanning, false otherwise

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes the manager.

      • isBLESupported

        public boolean isBLESupported()
        Indicates whether the current device supports BLE or not
        Returns:
        true if the device supports BLE, false otherwise

      • isBluetoothEnabled

        public boolean isBluetoothEnabled()
        Indicates whether Bluetooth is enabled on the divce or not.
        Returns:
        true if Bluetooth is enabled on the device, false otherwise.

      • connect

        public void connect(Peripheral peripheral,
                    OnConnectListener listener)
        Connects to the given peripheral and registers the OnConnectListener.
        Parameters:
        peripheral - an instance of Peripheral to be connected
        listener - an instance of OnConnectListener which will be called after connection finishes

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        Disconnects to the currently connected peripheral if exists.

      • connectWithDelay

        public void connectWithDelay(Peripheral peripheral,
                             OnConnectListener listener)
        Connects to the given peripheral and registers the OnConnectListener after 500ms delay.
        Parameters:
        peripheral - an instance of Peripheral to be connected
        listener - an instance of OnConnectListener which will be called after connection finishes

      • disconnectWithDelay

        public void disconnectWithDelay()
        Disconnects to the currently connected peripheral if exists after 500ms delay.

      • getBluetoothGattWriter

        public BluetoothGattWriter getBluetoothGattWriter()
        Returns an instance of BluetoothGattWriter to change Bluetooth characteristics(e.g. uuid, txPower, major id, minor id, advertisement interval).
        Returns:
        null if BluetoothGattWriter exists , in other words changing characteristic is possible at the moment, false otherwise

      • isConnected

        public boolean isConnected()
        Indicates whether the central currently is connected to a peripheral
        Returns:
        true if connected, false otherwise

      • getPeripheral

        public Peripheral getPeripheral(java.lang.String bdAddress)
        Returns a Peripheral corresponding to the given bdAddress.
        Parameters:
        bdAddress - Bluetooth device address
        Returns:
        a Peripheral corresponding to the given bdAddress
